Package pl.mgarbowski.hotelapp.commands

Class BookingCommands

java.lang.Object
pl.mgarbowski.hotelapp.commands.BookingCommands
@Command(command="booking", group="booking") public class BookingCommands extends Object
Shell commands for managing bookings.

  • Method Details

    • makeBooking

      @Command(command="make", description="Book an apartment") public String makeBooking(Integer apartmentId, Date startDate, Date endDate, Integer nPeople)
      Makes a booking for an apartment.
      Parameters:
      apartmentId - the ID of the apartment
      startDate - the start date of the booking
      endDate - the end date of the booking
      nPeople - the number of people for the booking
      Returns:
      a message indicating the booking status

    • makeComplaint

      @Command(command="makeComplaint", description="Make a complaint about a booking") public String makeComplaint(Integer bookingId, String complaintText)
      Makes a complaint about a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking
      complaintText - the text of the complaint
      Returns:
      a message indicating the complaint status

    • addOpinion

      @Command(command="addOpinion", description="Add an opinion to a booking") public String addOpinion(Integer bookingId, Integer starRating, String opinionText)
      Adds an opinion to a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking
      starRating - the star rating
      opinionText - the text of the opinion
      Returns:
      a message indicating the opinion status

    • getActiveBookings

      @Command(command="list", description="List current user\'s active bookings") String getActiveBookings()
      Lists the current user's active bookings.
      Returns:
      a formatted string of the user's active bookings
